title: Average price for a soak-off gel application in nail salons in the U.S. 2010 to 2016
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 7 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely negative which exists from 2012 to 2014.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2014 to 2016.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely negative which exists from 2010 to 2011.
But, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2011 to 2012.
gold: This statistic shows the average price for a soak-off gels application in nail salons in the United States from 2010 to 2016 . Nail salons charged an average price of 36.64 for an initial soak-off gel application in 2014 .
